

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from zen_product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
              from zen_sessions
              where sesskey = 'uiuopa60oko0srhjb0iii4emt1'
              and expiry > '1326814818';
